summary: The diff shows implementation of admin authentication credentials (REQ-1) but lacks evidence of sign-in flow implementation (REQ-2) and admin panel access control/display functionality (REQ-3). The useAdminAuth hook provides authentication methods but there is no visible integration with routing, login UI, or admin panel components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement a sign-in process that requires authentication before accessing the admin panel
missing_requirements.reason: No login form component, no route protection logic, and no redirect implementation visible in the diff. The useAdminAuth hook exists but shows no integration with any UI or routing layer.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the admin panel displays all settings and all received appointments after successful login
missing_requirements.reason: No admin panel component modifications shown in the diff. While frontend-file-summaries.txt mentions admin dashboard exists in App.tsx, there are no changes shown to integrate authentication checks or ensure appointment data display post-login.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive console logging throughout the authentication hook with detailed timestamp, credential matching, and session storage debugging
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest contains no requirements for debugging, logging, or diagnostic output. The implementation adds comprehensive console.log statements that were not requested.
